text: @MiaFarrow @DianeRavitch Kudos to Manhattan & all of NY & NJ for all your hard work battling Covid! You would think the rest of the USA would’ve learned from you all, but the #Covid19 #’s show that to be a lie. I’m hoping we all wake up before it’s too late & every state looks like NY did! #PrayingFromMI
